snippet.title: Cloudy Super Mario Bros. U 2 - Version 2.0 Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Cloudy Super Mario Bros. U 2, the New Super Mario Bros. U for Wii U mod I worked on for over 4 years before finally releasing it earlier this year, has received its first major update.
Download: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/12pAcqt93Jw2dAm2NU0Mkf5YjOaU6Ck2d

Check out the original mod's trailer: https://youtu.be/F3suiGQP4VM

This update features:
- Improvements to many tilesets, particularly background rocks and normal maps
- Improvements to almost every level by improving star coins, removing jank, fixing bugs and other miscellaneous fixes 
- Translations into German, French, Spanish and Dutch
- Improved console parity, making the mod now nearly identical when played on a Wii U as opposed to Cemu

► NSMBWii / NSMBU Modding Discord: https://discord.gg/aZAaXVJ
